title: Titleist logo
content:
I need help finding the download of the titleist font. See picture. I only know that this is similar to the the font in "That's All Folks" as seen after Bugs Bunny cartoons.   
Any help will be appreciated. ![Titleist Font](http://web.archive.org/web/20130621113023im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/33717.gif)
author: chiefyelnats

comments.content:
are you sure you don't want the Holes font, Stanley? ![:-)](http://web.archive.org/web/20130621113023im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/clipart/happy.gif)   
this one has come up a few times ...   
 [http://www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/3221.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20130621113023/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/3221.html)   
   
bj
Wow, notice how I turned that thread into a Stewf thread.

This must be the third or fourth time people ask about   
the Titleist logo...   
   
Stephen that was a funny thread indeed. It's a shame   
your original icon isn't there anymore, because a lot   
of it doesn't make any sense now.
